ygData.subject: Re: Analysis Version 2.
ygData.msgSnippet: Agreed with both points: 1. Gnomish wiz got better stats for total INT+DEX+AGI. 2. DE wiz look better, hehe, gotta admit that.  But in my eye, high elf got the
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed with both points:

1. Gnomish wiz got better stats for total INT+DEX+AGI.
2. DE wiz look better, hehe, gotta admit that. But in my eye, high elf got
the best look amg all elves, thou DE's blue skill look cool, but kinda
small built. H/w, one of the necro guides I've read is written by a gnome
necro and the play love his char like crazy becoz he enjoy 'draining life'
from those big guys around him ;)

Also try a erudite wiz last night but cannot play w/o infravision, thou
they have the highest INT.

Btw, it just happened that I've leaving work place when I wrote those msg,
keep writing and retriving mails, hehe.

Mondain

On Monday, June 14, 1999 6:27 PM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
wrote:
> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>
> I would say the gnomish wizard would be better in stats than the de wiz,
but
> talking bout outwards look, i think dark elf looks nicer. ) However,
being a
> wiz, its kinda bad playing a de, since playing another race is better cos
of
> the faction thing. Some classes cannot be avoided, in reference to
faction
> such as necro or shadow knight since most ppl will not like u anyways.
> btw, you guys are responding very fast, are u all checking mail every 5
> mins?
> -----Original Message-----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, June 14, 1999 6:21 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Analysis Version 2.
>
>
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> >Disagree. Talk abt total DEX and AGI, gnome is 5 points more. Talk abt
> >INT, gnome is one point more.
> >
> >Gnome also got nightvision, thou it's not ultravision. But at lvl 12,
wiz
> >will get the ligh band spell which is a head band with light of large
> >lightstone plus ac 3.
> >
> >Talk abt faction, gnome has the best faction with other races (same as
> >dwarf). Only this 2 races have good relation with all races except
against
> >troll, dark elf and orge, but they do not get KOS by these 3 evil races
> >like other humaniod races - they are only unwelcomed by the evil races.
> > For all other humaniod races, they get KOS by evil races and vice
versa.
> >
> >Any other reason that say DE wiz is better than gnome? - other than the
> >fact the gnome eye lvl does not hit other char's chest lvl - very impt
when
> >talking to female chars, hehe.
> >
> >Note that this is not an arguement abt DE or gnome wiz better but I
would
> >love to find out more abt the wiz class ;)
> >
> >Mondain
> >
> >
> >

> >wrote:
> >> From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>

> >>

> >>
> >> Now down to the faction thingy,DarkElf wizards can choose AGNOSTIC
which
> >> means they wont be KOS by humans however will be
elves.However,Darkelves
> >> would pass through freeport to get to faydwer,so killing orcs on the
way
> >> would enable access to elves territory which thus improves faction
with
> >> dwarves,gnomes.Now all races like u :P,and BTW killing orcs does not
> >> decrease ya faction with darkelves...so its a good factionbooster
enemy.
> >>
> >> Generally,Darkelves hate every single race besides themselves ..duh!So
I
> >do
> >> not think much enemies would actualyl lower ya faction with ya guild.
> >>
> >> This is through my experience with a DarkElf warrior[I was not KOS in
> >> freeport,riverdale,commons,etc] and a Darkelf Wizard.
> >>
> >> Conclusion:Darkelves simply rock once u pass the faction thingy.
> >>

can

> >> >into...
> >> >
> >> >i think i better get back to work... :)
> >> >Fred

> >> >> I've analysed the erudite, dark elf and gnome when I try to make my
> >2nd
> >> >> wiz. No doubt erudite and dark elf "seem' to have better vital
stats
> >for
> >> >a
> >> >> wiz, but if you look at an overall view, a gnome seems to work out
> >> >better -
> >> >> due to the high dex and high agi, which I top them up with 5 stats
> >each
> >> to
> >> >> make them 90. Having high dex, my casting rarely get disturbed,
and
> >with
> >> >> high agi, many times I managed to kill my opponents b4 they killed
me
> >> when
> >> >> it's a fair fight coz I can avoid their attack and blast them back.
> > The
> >> >> impt stats for wiz is INT and STA, which is where I spend all my 30
> >stats
> >> >> points when I create my 1st high elf wiz in Innoruuk. H/w, after
> >reading
> >> >> so many player guides in the net, I realised we all missed a very
impt
> >> >> point - ie to built AGI instead of STA. Why? Becoz at high lvl,
> >compare
> >> >> putting 5 points in STA and AGI, will u wanna get hit by a monster
> >that
> >> >> delivery a 100 HP dam with the additional 25HP gain due to the 5
STA
> >> >> points, or to stand a higher chance to totally avoid the 100 HP
dam?
> >;)
> >> >>
> >> >> I think EQVault, EQSS, EQlore, EQlizer, EQGuide etc all have very
> >> >> interesting and informative articles on creating chars which worth
> >> reading
> >> >> b4 making a new char ;)
> >> >>
> >> >> Always remember - the game itself has the default vital stats for
each
> >> >> class, but we have to consider our playing style as well. Simply
> >> building
> >> >> up based on the vital status may hinder ya survival in EQ :)
> >> >>
> >> >> Mondain (Gnome Wiz)
> >> >>
> >> >> p/s: OK buddy Leshrec, I will join u in making an evil char to wipe
> >out
> >> >the
> >> >> painskin pigs, whahahahahaah! I leave you guys to guess what I'm
> >> creating
> >> >> tonight....maybe a surprise for all when I reach high lvl, heh.
> >> >>
